title: [SOLVED]820-3023 video artifacts
message:
Hi guys, 

I've got a MacBook Air a1369 with video artifacts. Normally I would consider this a dGPU problem, but it doesn't have one. Any ideas?

Thanks, Rick

title: [SOLVED]820-3023 video artifacts
message:
i had this problem with A1369, begining by video artefacts, finish by 3 beeps and black screen at startup, reflow ram solved problem for me probably corrosion.
Work some time and 3 beep again i have reballing all ram and solved this problem but A lot of wasted time

title: [SOLVED]820-3023 video artifacts
message: RAM issue likely. Can you make a picture?

title: [SOLVED]820-3023 video artifacts
message: Customer changed his mind and isn't going to get this fixed, thankfully. Thanks for your help.
